messages.message:
This is a huge change! Good that you tested deploying the sandbox with this to make sure it works.

Had a few Q
1. Does this have any impact on build performance?
2. Can you add a doc - maybe in the root folder Claude.md or something on how to update go vulnerabilities with this structure?

(1) The images remain the same (chainguard). Don't anticipate any perf problems; a go binary is a go binary whether bazel builds it or not. However, the _docker_ builds are much faster now; they cache more effectively.

(2) Yes, will do. I think there is a runbook that I'll update as well.
